item.title: グーグルがグーグルリーダーを廃止してから10年、多くの人に愛されたRSSアプリを開発したチームが、何が間違っていたのか、何があり得たのかを振り返る（David Pierce/The Verge）
item.description:
David Pierce / The Verge:
Ten years after Google killed Google Reader, the team that built the much-beloved RSS app reflects on what went wrong and what could have been  —  Ten years after its untimely death, the team that built the much-beloved feed reader reflects on what went wrong and what could have been.

item.title: Twitterのウェブアプリのバグが原因でTwitterがDDoSを受けているようだと開発者が語っている。イーロン・マスクの緊急ブロックとレート制限に関連している可能性がある（Andy Baio/Waxy.org）
item.description:
Andy Baio / Waxy.org:
A developer says Twitter appears to be DDoSing itself due to a bug in Twitter's web app, which could be tied to Elon Musk's emergency blocks and rate limits  —  For the last two days, Elon Musk has claimed that Twitter is under attack from “several hundred organizations” who were conducting …

item.title: WBDのデイビッド・ザスラブCEOの不手際と、ディズニーやパラマウント・グローバルのようなライバルが採用しているコスト削減のための不評な計画について（ジョー・フリント／ウォール・ストリート・ジャーナル紙）
item.description:
Joe Flint / Wall Street Journal:
A look at WBD CEO David Zaslav's unforced errors and unpopular plans to cut costs, some of which have been by adopted by rivals like Disney and Paramount Global  —  Warner Bros. Discovery CEO has made unpopular cuts and missteps while dealing with a heavy debt load and changing media landscape

item.title: 世界最古の日刊紙のひとつであるオーストリアのウィーナー・ツァイトゥング紙が320年の歴史に幕を閉じる。
item.description:
Associated Press:
Austria's Wiener Zeitung, one of the oldest daily newspapers in the world, ends its print run after 320 years; a recent law change caused a sharp revenue drop  —  One of the world's oldest newspapers, the Vienna-based Wiener Zeitung, ended its daily print run Friday after more than three centuries.

item.title: イーロン・マスク氏、Twitterのログイン要求は「一時的な緊急措置」だと主張 「数百」の組織が「Twitterのデータを極めて積極的にスクレイピング」していたため（Matt Binder/Mashable）
item.description:
Matt Binder / Mashable:
Elon Musk claims Twitter login requirement is a “temporary emergency measure” as “several hundred” orgs were “scraping Twitter data extremely aggressively”  —  Twitter is currently blocking visitors from viewing tweets and profiles unless they are logged in.

item.title: イーロン・マスク氏、「極端な」データスクレイピングのため、Twitterの認証済みアカウントは1日あたり10K投稿、未認証は1K投稿、新規未認証は500投稿の閲覧に一時的に制限されると発表（Manish Singh/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Manish Singh / TechCrunch:
Elon Musk says verified Twitter accounts are temporarily limited to reading 10K posts/day, unverified 1K, and new unverified 500, due to “extreme” data scraping  —  Twitter is putting limits to how many tweets its users can read as the Elon Musk-owned service suffers extended outage …

item.title: 2005年に設立された香港の民主派ラジオ局「市民ラジオ」が、最近の銀行口座凍結で運営が維持できなくなり、放送を停止（Kari Soo Lindberg/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Kari Soo Lindberg / Bloomberg:
Hong Kong pro-democracy radio station Citizens' Radio, founded in 2005, suspends broadcasting after a recent bank account freeze made operations unsustainable  —  A Hong Kong pro-democracy radio station will air its final show Friday evening, ending nearly two decades of broadcasting due to what it called a …

item.title: 有力週刊紙「ル・ジャーナル・デュ・ディマンシュ」の親会社であるラガールを買収する、保守的なフランスの大富豪ヴァンサン・ボロールのプロフィール（フィナンシャル・タイムズ紙）。
item.description:
Financial Times:
A profile of conservative French billionaire Vincent Bolloré, who is acquiring Lagardère, the parent of influential weekly newspaper Le Journal du Dimanche  —  Having created a French version of Fox News, he now has one of the country's most influential newspapers in his sights

item.title: WBD、ディズニー、ネットフリックス、映画芸術科学アカデミーが過去10日間にDEIリーダーを解雇または失い、「多様性疲労」の懸念が高まる（Sharon Knolle/The Wrap）
item.description:
Sharon Knolle / The Wrap:
WBD, Disney, Netflix, and the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences laid off or lost DEI leaders in the past 10 days, raising “diversity fatigue” concerns  —  Diversity, Equity and Inclusion Execs From Warner Bros. Discovery, Disney, Netflix and the Academy were either laid off or left their jobs in the past 10 days

item.title: ユーチューブ、北朝鮮のインフルエンサー3人のチャンネルを削除 韓国が「心理戦」の道具とレッテルを貼ったため（Christian Davies/Financial Times）
item.description:
Christian Davies / Financial Times:
YouTube removes the channels of three North Korean influencers posting about their daily life, after South Korea labelled them as “psychological warfare” tools  —  Seoul says young influencers promoting Harry Potter and water parks are ‘psychological’ propaganda

item.title: SAG-AFTRAとAMPTPは、6月30日に期限を迎える現行の映画・テレビ契約を7月12日まで延長し、新契約の交渉を継続することで合意した（David Robb/Deadline）
item.description:
David Robb / Deadline:
SAG-AFTRA and the AMPTP agreed to extend the current film and TV contract, set to expire June 30, to July 12 to allow for continued negotiations on a new deal  —  UPDATED with joint statement: SAG-AFTRA and the Alliance of Motion Picture and Television Producers agreed Friday to extend …

item.title: 米国立気象局唯一の気象番組「アラスカ・ウェザー」が7月1日からYouTubeに移行し、インターネットが不安定な人はアクセスしづらくなる（Mark Thiessen/Associated Press）
item.description:
Mark Thiessen / Associated Press:
The US National Weather Service's only weather show, Alaska Weather, is moving to YouTube on July 1, making access difficult for those with unreliable internet  —  Before Morris Nashoanak heads out for days in search of bearded seals, beluga whales or salmon, he catches the weather on TV.

item.title: IPSOは、ジェレミー・クラークソンが『ザ・サン』紙のコラムでメーガン・マークルのセックスについて「侮蔑的かつ偏見的」な言及をしたと指摘。
item.description:
Manori Ravindran / Variety:
IPSO says Jeremy Clarkson made a “pejorative and prejudicial” reference to Meghan Markle's sex in a column in The Sun, which must publish a front-page statement  —  The U.K.'s media watchdog, the Independent Press Standards Organisation (IPSO), has upheld two complaints lodged …

item.title: 早ければ6月30日午前0時（太平洋標準時）にも、俳優が脚本家のストライキに加わる可能性があるが、SAG-AFTRAのスタジオ交渉では、双方とも期限を過ぎても話し合いに応じる姿勢を見せている（Andrew Dalton/Associated Press
item.description:
Andrew Dalton / Associated Press:
Actors could join writers on strike as soon as June 30 at midnight PDT, but both sides are open to talking past the deadline for SAG-AFTRA's studio negotiations  —  Hollywood actors may be on the verge of joining screenwriters in what would be the first two-union strike in the industry …

item.title: 報道エフゲニー・プリゴージンがパトリオット・メディア・グループを閉鎖し、ロスコムナゾールがいくつかのニュース配信をブロック。
item.description:
The Moscow Times:
Reports: Yevgeny Prigozhin shuts down Patriot Media Group, and Roskomnadzor blocks several of its news outlets; Prigozhin has not confirmed or denied the claims  —  Wagner mercenary group leader Yevgeny Prigozhin has closed down his St. Petersburg-based media holding, according to multiple media reports published Friday.
